reviewText: It just make me wanna ride! Great movie! A bit old but great!

I do not write reviews in fact this is the first one to my knowledge that I have... But hands down this is by far the one of the best pure Motorcycling movies I have ever had the pleasure of watching. It follows in the footsteps and in my mind triumphs "on any Sunday" the film work and quality are superb! What these guys ride through, over and down is insane! Absolute EPIC move that I'm so glad I purchased instead of rented as it will be a joy to share with family and friends!! well done!!!  If you are like me and read the reviews before watching take the following as my endorsement... If Amazon would allow me I would personally reimburse anyone that rented or who purchased this  who did not feel that they got their moneys worth. The fact that at this time this movie only has 5 reviews is tragic!!!
Great movie top quality production we play it in the showroom people love it!!! Would recommend it to anyone who loves dirtbikes!

I read a review of videos in Motorcycle Consumer News and the author of the review really loved this.  I'm glad I own it. For me it is best to watch in pieces and revisit in pieces rather than consume the whole thing at once.
Great movie, lots of action lots of entertainment... Well worth the price of admission. When the DVD is available, I'll buy it.

If you are into extreme enduro racing this video is for you. Man vs Machine is packed with hours of some of the world's hardest enduros. Prepare yourself ahead of time - after watching this move your p*** will look much smaller.  These guys/gals are freaks. Well worth the money.
Great movie about extreme enduro. Current with top riders and beautiful video. Unbelievable what these guys can do to make it to the finish line.
